summary: Just a fresh Orc called Runt immediately after character gen so no decisions have yet been made on how to play her.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m not happy with the amount of clones in this game due to the severely (seriously, we can\'t even adjust nose width?) limited character gen as such I didn\'t intend to upload saves till we get the CS to fix it but a friend asked me to upload one of them so I figured I may as well.

This was my most recent character, I had intended to try mage again but I just fine mages tedious in this so I went as heavy armour with a two hander yet again.

This save is immediately after character gen, before you first gain control of your character to allow skill distribution as you see fit.

It has to be said I am using some texture mods/fixes as listed below, all available on skyrimnexus.

No More Blocky Faces + LUEF patch by Xenius & arlekin
Detailed Faces by Xenius
Detailed Bodies by Xenius
High Quality Eyes by Xenius

I don\'t use the lips mod however despite testing it so be warned that does change the appearance quite dramatically, I just wanted a more natural un-made up look for characters where I felt the lips mod looked more like lipstick with my settings.
author: Badmagic
